input.sentences: no one bothered to clear the snow off the wind .
and no one shoveled the stairs .
i was so mad | i did a high kick .
but that did nothing to help the snow situation .
output.sentences: During the night it snowed, leaving a layer of white on the lot in front of the house, where I exited to head to the gym.
Even though the snow and wind stung my eyes, I was more bothered by the graffiti on the dilapidated wall.
As I made my way to the gym, I discovered the stairs had yet to be shoveled.
Mad at the lack of safety on the steps, I kick at the balls more enthusiastically than normal.
After the game, I realize that maybe my energy would be better spent shoveling the snow to alleviate the dangerous situation.
